article: Food is important. Everyone needs to  _  well if he wants to have a strong body. Our minds also need a kind of food. This kind of food is  _  We begin to get knowledge even when we are young. Small children are  _  in everything around them. They learn something while they  are watching  and listening. When they are getting older they begin  to read  storybooks, science books and anything they like. When they find  something new  , they have to ask questions and try to get the answers. What is the best  _  to get knowledge? If we learn by ourselves, we  will get  the most knowledge. If we are  _  getting answers from  others  and don't ask why, we will never learn more or understand better.
